Getting Started¶

Installation Instructions:

Use git to clone the repository:

git clone http://github.com/johnjasa/OpenAeroStruct

Use pip to install openaerostruct locally:

cd openaerostruct

pip install .

Hello, World!¶

Here is a really short run file to get you started running your first optimization. Copy the code into a file named hello_world.py and run it by typing:

python hello_world.py

prob = self.setup_aero()
prob.run_driver()
print(prob['obj'])
